description: Game mechanics rolls using character statistics

usage_documentation.purpose: Performs game mechanics rolls (abilities, skills, attacks) using character statistics. Returns mechanical results only (no narration) and writes roll results to episode file.

roll_types.ability: Roll an ability check (STR, DEX, CON, etc.)
roll_types.attack: Roll an attack using a power

roll_execution.description: Rolls are executed using character statistics from the character sheet
roll_execution.optional_episode_write: Roll results can optionally be written to episode file if episode_id parameter is provided

roll_result.roll_target: What was rolled (ability name, skill name, attack name)

mcp_tool.name: character_roll_execute
mcp_tool.description: Execute game mechanics roll (abilities, skills, attacks) using character statistics

roll_command.description: Roll command in natural language (e.g., 'roll STR check', 'roll Blast power attack')

episode_id.description: Optional episode ID to write roll results to
